body:
Task : Tell a scary story using 6 words or less!

Rules :
  • You can't use more than 6 words! (No cheating!)
  • Contractions count as ONE word
  • Doesn't need to be a complete sentece (But I think those are cooler)
  • Be creative and have fun!
Examples :
  • Your browser history is public.
  • You're alone in bed. Blankets shift.
  • I just saw my reflection blink.
  • He screamed at his funeral.
  • It enjoys watching you sleep.
  • The train hit a speed bump?

replies.body:
Then I realized; we're BOTH lying.
"Dad, why does mom always cry?"
We agreed to forget the unforgettable.
Together we share our final breath.
His children went hungry another night.
Doctors' ex's eat apples once daily.
She peeled the daughter sticker off.
For sale; baby crib. Not used.

replies.body: Sorry for saying this (my OCD is killing me), but I'm pretty sure you mean contractions, not conjunctions, in the rules. Contractions are words like "can't" and "won't", while conjunctions are words like "and" and "or".
